text: @drsangitareddy @COVID19 @aiims_newdelhi @PMOIndia @MoHFW_INDIA @HospitalsApollo @drharshvardhan RIP Dr. Pande ! One of India’s finest doctors. Deeply Saddened. He took great care of my grand mother and my entire family.
